meanings.definition: Used to express agreement or affirmation.
meanings.sent2: She said, 'Yus,' when asked if she liked the idea.
meanings.sent3: Yus, that's the way to go!
meanings.sent4: His smile was a 'yus' to her suggestion.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered with a resounding 'yus!'

meanings.sent4: Her 'yus' was music to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The 'yus' painted a smile on her face.
